ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

trait.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
entries: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against {@condition frightened|Ishiir} creatures.

trait.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} cold damage.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
entries: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened|Ishiir} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened|Ishiir} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.
The creature receives a bonus to this skill check equal to your spell attack bonus.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Eidolon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's proficiency is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's proficiency is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's proficiency is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your proficiency (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

trait.name: Versatile Skills
entries: Choose two additional skills for your Eidolon. You can change these skill any time you summon your Eidolon.
Alternatively, you can choose only one skill, but your Eidolon doubles its proficiency for any skill check it makes with it.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.

entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's proficiency is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

hp.special: 20 + 15 per spell level (the steed has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the spell's level)

trait.name: Life Bond
entries: When you regain Hit Points, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Otherworldly Slam
entries: {@atk m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d8 + summonSpellLevel} of Radiant (Celestial), Psychic (Fey), or Necrotic (Fiend) damage.

bonus.name: Fell Glare (Fiend Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of your next turn.

bonus.name: Fey Step (Fey Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

bonus.name: Healing Touch (Celestial Only; Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to {@dice 2d8 + summonSpellLevel}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Poison Jab
entries: {@atk m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 10 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Piercing damage plus {@damage 1d4} Poison damage.

action.name: Web Bolt (Spider Only)
entries: {@atk r} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, range 60 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Bludgeoning damage, and the target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn if it is Huge size or smaller.

bonus.name: Venomous Spew (Centipede Only)
entries: {@actSave con} Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of the insect's next turn.
